content: This is a simple question, When this bearish market end and Bull run start.Thanks

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: No perfect date but by 2024 there will be another BITCOIN Halving, this will reduce the block reward of Bitcoin to half which means miners will earn even less and it will cause more scarcity, every bitcoin halving the market will start appreciating.

comments.author: Morningstarr
comments.body: Quote from: haleema on August 26, 2022, 06:29:05 PMThis is a simple question, When this bearish market end and Bull run start.Thanks As soon as inflation starts to come down, which we have seen in the last two months, there has been a lower-than-expected rise in inflation if it continues this will be good news for the market. Apart from this, the decline in oil prices in the last few weeks is also good news for the market But most importantly, if the interest rate increases, then the market can see bearish. Markets may move bullish if interest rates are cut or not hiked further, but the odds are that a 0.75% rate hike could happen Because the Fed has said that every possible method will be adopted to deal with inflation.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: This is a common question and the answer is the same no one can say. To know about it you should follow the previous chart. You can see after every bear market there was a bull trend. So it is a long time since we are in a bear market although we are expecting a bull market, I don't think it's going to happen very soon. Most of us know that because of the world's economy is collapsing day by day due to various reasons. So we cannot say when the market will recover. I have seen some people predicting the market would go down.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: This isn't a simple question because there's no actual answer on it.  Like now, the market plunges and there could be folks now thinking that it's already a bear market.But we don't know if this dip could just be a trap and shaking the weak hands.Your question is already going to be answered by the market and you'll get a hint and you decide to label if we're already in bull or bear market.

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: Quote from: haleema on August 26, 2022, 06:29:05 PMThis is a simple question, When this bearish market end and Bull run start.Thanks The crypto market is speculative. No one can predict such. But during the previous times, we have seen bullrun after bitcoin halving everytime.. This might change but bear markets mostly ends after bitcoin halving and bull markets starts not immediately but just within months after the halving.But have it in mind that anything can happen at anytime because the market is speculative and everything is changing with time.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: haleema on August 26, 2022, 06:29:05 PMThis is a simple question, When this bearish market end and Bull run start.Thanks Bear starts when the price goes dipper while bull starts on the recovery price.If you are asking for the timing, i guess no one can answer you with this one. Again, its good to have basic knowledge about this before investing, don’t forget to invest with yourself first because it’s very important. Bull and bear can be your friend, just know how to timing and analyze well.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: haleema on August 26, 2022, 07:55:09 PMwhats my seniors advise for me, can i sell my tokens or wait. because already am in loss.What to do depends almost entirely on what coins you are holding, if you are holding good coins like bitcoin or ethereum then probably the best move that you can do is to hold your coins until the next bull market appears, and you can either sell your coins when they reach the price at which you bought or you can decide to keep holding them hoping to get some profits.However if you took a risk and invested in some coins which are outside of the top 100 then it is very possible that you are never going to recover your money, and as such it may be a good idea to sell now.

Currently the market is somewhat stagnant and from here both directions are possible. You just have to wait and watch.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: That's a difficult question even for someone who has lots of experience in the crypto market. You are asking us to look at the future and then go back here and tell you what is happening there. That only happens in the movies. All I could suggest is to keep yourself ready for what will happen. That's how investors and traders survive a volatile market. Keep monitoring the market, don't be impatient about how it's static for now. This event also happened before at $3k price of Bitcoin and then suddenly..I think you know what's next.
